titles.title: A resolution celebrating the 100th anniversary of the Mississippi Farm Bureau Federation.
A resolution celebrating the 100th anniversary of the Mississippi Farm Bureau Federation.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution (1) celebrates October 30, 2022, as the 100th anniversary of the Mississippi Farm Bureau Federation; and (2) commemorates the history, effective advocacy, and contributions to agriculture in Mississippi of the federation.
